name: Booze Blues (hatsfourcats)
description:
A prohibition era side scroller with randomized level layout. Avoid wildlife, rival bootleggers, and the fuzz.

Created by a 3 person team for Awful Summer Jam 2017

Art - Arianimation

Programming/Level design - https://lysdexique.itch.io/

Programming /Level design - https://hatsfourcats.itch.io/

Controls
  •  Punch only works on human enemies. 
  • Booze up gives you 5 seconds of invulnerability and costs 5 booze. 
  • Throw costs 1 booze. 
  • Mid level checkpoints cost 10 booze. 
  • Each level has a minimum booze amount required to finish.

Music

"Fig Leaf Rag", "Olde Timey", "Amazing Plan" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Sound Effects

Art - arianimation@gmail.com
